name: The Tale Of Red Riding Hood
name_original: The Tale Of Red Riding Hood
description:
The Tale of Red Riding hood is an Action-JRPG focused around the character of Little Red Riding Hood.

Our heroine is grown up and now she has to explore and face the world outside the forest while looking for someone she cares about, who was kidnapped on her 18th birthday.

This game has been released on the 22nd of May in Early Access.

The game at this state is not completed and only the first portion of the game can be played. Expect bugs and unfinished things. If you have suggestions please use the game community here on itch.io.

Visit the Facebook Page for news, fans discussions and randomness. Also the hashtag #TaleOfRRH is available to discuss the game with us on Twitter.

Features (may change in the future)
  • Exciting action-rpg gameplay with exciting battles
  • Explore the world with a now grown-up Red Riding Hood, uncovering its secrets
  • Beautiful graphics
Planned features
  • A large living world
  • Lots of lore to be found
  • Magic
  • Battle improvements
Know Issues
  • Linux Version is untested. Please report us any problem you may find.

Developed by CodingGeronimo team.
